forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle after 11pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 52. Southwest wind around 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Drizzle then Partly Sunny
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle before 11am. Partly sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 7 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
As the evening envelops Downtown San Francisco, a gentle murmur of clouds drapes the city in a shroud of anticipation, hinting at a slight chance of drizzle after nightfall. With temperatures settling around 52 degrees, the night invites a soft embrace of comfort. The southwest wind carries whispers through the streets, lending a cool touch that lingers in the air. As dusk proceeds, one might find solace in layers; a light jacket will shield against the chill as the city prepares to rest.

Looking ahead to Tuesday, the day promises a tentative awakening with a hint of sunshine thrumming beneath the clouds. The high will nudge near 60, but a gradual cooling will accompany the afternoon, ushering in an almost serene dimness. An absence of the sun's full radiance may keep spirits slightly subdued, yet the mild gusts will stir a hint of refreshing clarity, inviting exploration. Perhaps a leisurely stroll along the Ferry Building, with its exquisite artisanal offerings, would satisfy one’s quest for a gentle morning out. As the day unfolds, one might also find delight in a visit to a quaint coffee shop, relishing a warm beverage as an antidote to the crisp air.
